data.name: superTipSettings1.Text
data.value: Field indicating how the charge is applied. When a single level is selected e.g. Linehaul per truck, 1 qty is required which would be the number of trucks. When a basis with 2 levels is selected, then 2 values are required, e.g. per truck per day, which would require the number of trucks and the number of days.

data.name: superTipSettings7.Text
data.value: Used with the Unit Type field to describe the number of units for the given type. If type was MILE then this field will contain the total number of miles. When the Type is FLAT or N/A then the rate is a FLAT rate and the Units field should contain a value of 1.
